WordPress

WordPress is an open source software that gives you the ability to create websites. WordPress as a software falls under the CMS category also known as a Content Management System.

Why WordPress Is Popular

WordPress is hands down the most popular way of creating a website and for some very good reasons. Below you'll find a few reasons as to why almost half of the websites online are powered by WordPress.

WordPress Has A Large Community

One of the main benefits of WordPress is it's popularity. The WordPress community is very large and theirs tons of information out their to help you make the adjustment you need. What that means is that if theirs a problem or you need to add something very specific to your wordpress website than you theirs probably a tutorial out there for it.

WordPress Is Easy To Use

One of the main reasons Wordpress is so relevant in the website development industry is because of it's very intuitive interface. Things like customizaing the way a web page looks used to take a lot of time luckly over the last few years the WordPress developers have improved their interface even further by giving users the ability to do drag and drop page customization.

WordPress Makes It Easy To Blog

WordPress was initally a blogging platform which means it's main prupose was to give it's use the ability to quickly create a document with the aiblity.
